column4: I installed Breezy with succes, then i chages my sources list to Dapper and did update / -f upgrade

that broke my install, neither the 2.6.15 nor the 2.6.12 kernel will boot, can't find my root partition. I ran a dist-upgrade and now only 1 package is being held back. I still can't boot my system though
When i boot the recovery console versions, it just says 'ERROR: can't find /dev/sda2'
your new kernels arent loading scsi modules?
